name: @kodnificent/sparouter
description: A light weight SPA router basically for frontend routing

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=build run-p clean:dist clean:lib && run-p development production transpile
scripts.build:readme: documentation build documentation.js -f md -o README.md --shallow && documentation build documentation.js -f html -o ./docs/README.html --shallow && documentation build ./src/sparouter.js -f md -o ./API.md --shallow &&  documentation build ./src/sparouter.js -f html -o ./docs/API.html --shallow
scripts.check-package: echo "This is a list of your package files that will be uploaded to the npm registry" && npm pack && tar -xvzf *.tgz && rm -rf package *.tgz

author: sirvic-tech
